game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Find the ancient city of Eldarath and retrieve the powerful artifact.
game.description: Rumors have been circulating about a hidden city deep in the forest, where an ancient civilization once thrived. The city is said to contain a powerful artifact that could change the course of history. Brave adventurers are needed to explore the ruins and retrieve this treasure.
game.reward: 1000 gold pieces, a magical amulet granting resistance to darkness

tasks.objective: Gather information about the location of Eldarath
tasks.description: Speak with locals and gather rumors about the city's whereabouts.
tasks.location: The Rusty Goblet Inn, in the town of Willowdale

tasks.objective: Explore the forest and find the entrance to Eldarath
tasks.description: Venture into the heart of the forest, navigating through treacherous terrain and avoiding deadly creatures.
tasks.location: The Whispering Woods, approximately 5 miles north of Willowdale

tasks.objective: Retrieve the artifact from the ancient temple
tasks.description: Navigate the traps and puzzles within the ancient temple to claim the artifact.
tasks.location: Eldarath's Ancient Temple, deep within the Whispering Woods
